meta.title: Now
meta.description: Now is inspired by nownownow.com. This page is all about what I am up to now.

body.raw:
It's all about what I'm up to **now**. üë®‚Äçüíª A Free/libre open source software developer. üåè I'm trying out eating seasonal and local produce. üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è I'm lifting weight again! Making baby steps. ‚úèÔ∏è I'm learning to be a good technical writer. üå± I'm learning [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/). It's been fun!
*Last updated on February 18, 2022.*
